note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to PRuby!

Soon, a beginner's tutorial for Ruby 1.9 will follow, hopefully with many chapters and many problems.

The repo will contain the accompanying source files, but most content will be in the [Wiki](https://github.com/MichaelWhi/PRubyTutorial/wiki)

Right now, the first problem set is online, see the [Wiki](https://github.com/MichaelWhi/PRubyTutorial/wiki).
name: PRuby Tutorial Site
tagline: A repo for materials and problems for Ruby beginners. PRuby stands for "Promote Ruby"!
